This is the research compendium containing all analysis in Jardim et al. (2023) : **Habitat Complexity Promotes Species Richness and Community Stability in Biogenic Habitats:** *an example from maerl beds*

## Running the code

You can run all analysis and generate the Supporting Information html file only by sourcing the make.R file once you have forked the compendium.

Supporting Information is available at: 
https://victorleitejardim.github.io/jardim_et_al_2023/
